ocean.question: I have a shell and move very slowly. I might race a hare, but I won't win! What am I?

hints.text: 🏠 I carry my house on my back.
🥬 I like to eat lettuce.
🐌 I am a type of mollusk.

ocean.question: I am very big and blue, and boats sail on me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌊 I am made of water.
🐳 I am home to many animals.
🌎 I cover most of the Earth.

ocean.question: I have eight arms and live in the ocean. I can squirt ink when I'm scared. What am I?

hints.text: 🐙 I am an invertebrate.
🎨 I use ink to hide.
🧠 I am a very smart sea creature.

ocean.question: I'm a large sea animal with a smooth skin. I breathe through a blowhole. What am I?

hints.text: 🐋 I am a mammal.
🗣️ I make sounds to communicate with my family.
🪨 Some of us are very big and eat plankton.

ocean.question: I am a colorful fish that lives in warm waters. I can be blue, yellow, red, or even purple. What am I?

hints.text: 🐠 I live on the reef.
🏳️‍🌈 I come in many colors.
🧱 I can blend in with coral.

ocean.question: I am a sea creature with a hard shell and pincers. I walk sideways. What am I?

hints.text: 🦀 I scuttle along the sand.
💪 My pincers can be strong.
🦞 I am a type of crustacean.

ocean.question: I'm a very old reptile that swims in the sea. I have a shell and can live for a very long time. What am I?

hints.text: 🐢 I lay my eggs on the beach.
🌿 Some types of me eat seaweed.
👴 I am a sea turtle.

ocean.question: I'm a very big fish with lots of sharp teeth. People are often scared of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🦈 I am a predator.
🔪 My teeth are very sharp.
⚔️ I have been around for a very long time.

ocean.question: I am a tiny, glowing creature that lives in the ocean. I light up the water at night. What am I?

hints.text: ✨ I am bioluminescent.
🦠 I am very small, almost invisible.
🌃 I make the ocean sparkle.

ocean.question: I'm a place in the ocean where it's very deep and dark. Sunlight can't reach me. What am I called?

hints.text: 🌑 It is extremely dark here.
🌡️ The pressure is very high.
🔦 Some creatures here make their own light.

weather.question: I fall from the sky, but I'm not rain or snow. Sometimes I can sting!

hints.text: 🧊 I am frozen water.
💧 I can be very small.
🤕 Sometimes I hurt if I hit you.

weather.question: I am white and fluffy and fall from the sky in winter. What am I?

hints.text: ❄️ I am made of ice crystals.
⛄ People make snowmen out of me.
🌨️ I make the ground white.

weather.question: I come after the rain, and I am made of many colors. What am I?

hints.text: 🌈 I appear in the sky.
☀️ The sun needs to be out for me to appear.
💧 I am a reflection of light through water droplets.

weather.question: I am a big white thing in the sky. Sometimes I bring rain, sometimes just shade.

hints.text: ☁️ Birds fly around me.
🐑 I can look like a sheep.
🌧️ I can become dark and stormy.

weather.question: I am hot and yellow and give light to the world during the day.

hints.text: ☀️ I am a star.
😎 You need sunglasses when I am out.
🌻 Plants need me to grow.

weather.question: I howl and blow, sometimes gently, sometimes strong enough to knock down trees.

hints.text: 🍃 I move leaves.
🌬️ I am invisible, but you can feel me.
🪁 I can help you fly a kite.

weather.question: I am water falling from the sky, but I'm not snow. I help plants grow.

hints.text: ☔ You need an umbrella when I'm falling.
💧 I make puddles.
🌱 Plants drink me.

weather.question: I am a very strong storm with a spinning center. I can cause a lot of damage.

hints.text: 🌀 My name sometimes is a person's name.
🌊 I form over warm ocean water.
🏠 I have very strong winds that can destroy houses.

weather.question: I am a loud noise that comes after lightning during a storm. What am I?

hints.text: ⚡ I am the sound of lightning heating the air.
⛈️ You often hear me during a thunderstorm.
👂 Some people are scared when they hear me.

weather.question: I am very cold and icy precipitation that is smaller than hail and bounces when I hit the ground.

hints.text: 🥶 I am like a mix of rain and snow.
🧊 I am frozen, but not as big as hail.
⛸️ Conditions might be right for skating when I fall.
